title: Pentagon says Taliban and Haqqani 'commingling' as State Department defends calling them 'separate entities'
content:
1. Pentagon says Taliban and Haqqani 'commingling' as State Department defends calling them 'separate entities'  Yahoo News
  2. U.S. continues Afghanistan evacuations as Taliban beefs up security after Kabul attack  CBS This Morning
  3. Pentagon says Haqqani network 'co-mingling' with Taliban after State Dept calls them 'separate entities'  Fox News
  4. Afghanistan's economy may be only weeks from collapse, according to a former UN official  Yahoo! Voices
  5. On Afghanistan, Pakistan walks tightrope of optimism and caution  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Pentagon says Taliban and Haqqani 'commingling' as State Department defends calling them 'separate entities'  Yahoo News

localize.title: 米国防総省はタリバンとハッカニが「混ざり合っている」とし、国務省は「別々の組織」と呼ぶことを擁護している。
五角大楼称塔利班和哈卡尼 "混在一起"，国务院为称他们为 "独立实体 "辩护
五角大樓稱塔利班和哈卡尼 "混在一起"，國務院爲稱他們爲 "獨立實體 "辯護
